```{r}
library(RWeka)
library(ggplot2)
library(partykit)
library(dplyr)
```

# 1. Initialization

```{r}
sonar <- read.csv("sonar/sonar.all-data")

compareWith10Fold <- function(classifier) {
  print(summary(classifier))
  print(evaluate_Weka_classifier(classifier, numFolds = 10))
}
```

# 2. C4.5 Classifier

```{r}
J48(R ~ ., sonar) %>%
  compareWith10Fold()
```

Accuracy, Mean Error, precision, recall, f-score

# 3. Other Classifiers

## Random Forest

```{r}
make_Weka_classifier("weka/classifiers/trees/RandomForest")(R ~ ., data = sonar) %>%
  compareWith10Fold()
```

## Support Vector Machine

```{r}
SMO(R ~ ., data = sonar) %>%
  compareWith10Fold()
```

## Naive Bayes Classifier

```{r}
make_Weka_classifier("weka/classifiers/bayes/NaiveBayes")(R ~ ., data = sonar) %>%
  compareWith10Fold()
```

## Neural Network

```{r}
make_Weka_classifier("weka/classifiers/functions/MultilayerPerceptron")(R ~ ., data = sonar) %>%
  compareWith10Fold()
```

## Bagging

```{r}
Bagging(R ~ ., data = sonar, control = Weka_control(W = "weka.classifiers.trees.J48")) %>%
  compareWith10Fold()
```

## Boosting

```{r}
AdaBoostM1(R ~ ., data = sonar) %>%
  compareWith10Fold()
```
